events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but want to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected.
The customer's request relates to a refund due to sizing issues with a recent clothing purchase.
Assigning this refund case to the customer service representative specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and has not been worn or washed at all.
Thank you for the details. I have processed your refund request, and you should receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the refund confirmation soon.
The refund process is now complete, and your payment should reflect back on your card within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed successfully and all concerns are addressed, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
